description: As low Earth orbit becomes crowded, very low Earth orbit satellites are emerging as a promising alternative. Operating closer to Earth, they offer faster communication, sharper imaging, and better weather data. Advances in propulsion are helping overcome atmospheric drag, opening the door to wider use of this challenging but valuable orbital region.
title: The Next Space Frontier May Be Just 100 km Above Earth, Not the Moon or Mars

description: Astronomers have precisely measured the mass of a rogue planet wandering through the Milky Way using a rare gravitational microlensing event. By combining observations from ground-based telescopes across three continents with data from ESA’s Gaia spacecraft, researchers determined the planet’s distance and found it to be about the mass of Saturn. The discovery provides one of the clearest measurements of a free-floating planet to date and suggests that such starless worlds may be far more common than previously thought, offering new clues about planetary formation and evolution.
title: Astronomers Successfully Weigh a Starless ‘Rogue Planet’ Drifting Through the Milky Way

description: Qualcomm has announced the Snapdragon X2 Plus chipset ahead of CES 2026. The new compute platform features the company’s third-generation Oryon CPU architecture and an 80 TOPS neural engine for local AI inference. It is positioned within the Snapdragon X Series and will power the first wave of Copilot+ PC laptops arriving in early 2026.
title: CES 2026: Qualcomm Introduces Snapdragon X2 Plus Chipset for Copilot+ PCs

description: SpaceX has launched its first Starlink mission of 2026, sending 29 satellites into low Earth orbit aboard a new Falcon 9 rocket. The booster completed a successful landing at sea, while the mission further expanded the company’s global broadband network, which now serves remote regions with limited internet access.
title: SpaceX Launches 29 Starlink Satellites on Falcon 9 in Early-Morning Florida Liftoff

description: Dora and the Search for Sol Dorado is an animated adventure film now available on JioHotstar. The movie follows Dora and her friends as they journey through the jungle solving riddles and facing challenges to find the legendary Sol Dorado.
title: Dora and the Search for Sol Dorado Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know

description: Gravitational waves, first directly detected in 2015, have opened a new way of observing the universe. Now, physicist Ralf Schützhold of HZDR proposes going a step further—actively interacting with these ripples in spacetime using powerful lasers. His theoretical scheme builds on LIGO-style interferometers, where intense laser pulses bounce repeatedly along kilometer-scale arms. As a gravitational wave passes, the light could exchange tiny amounts of energy in the form of gravitons, subtly shifting its frequency. Detecting such changes would provide rare experimental evidence that gravity behaves quantum mechanically. If successful, the idea could help bridge the long-standing gap between general relativity and quantum physics.
title: New Study Explores How LIGO-Style Lasers Could Test Quantum Gravity

description: Ahead of CES 2026, Qualcomm detailed announcements across automotive, IoT, and robotics. The company highlighted wider adoption of Snapdragon Digital Chassis in vehicles, new Dragonwing processors for edge AI and vision systems, and a general-purpose robotics architecture built on the Dragonwing IQ10 Series. The chipmaker will also host an exhibition where some of these might be demonstrated.
title: Qualcomm Unveils Robotics-Focused Dragonwing IQ10 Series SoC, Expands IoT Portfolio Ahead of CES 2026

description: Qualcomm announced the new Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset in November last year. This new SoC is expected to be present in top Android smartphones. Here are the top phones that are coming with the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset. The list includes Realme Neo 8 and iQOO Z11 Turbo. More brands are expected to introduce new flagships featuring this latest SoC in the coming months.
title: Upcoming Smartphones With Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC: Realme Neo 8, iQOO Z11 Turbo and More

description: This list rounds up some of the best gaming headphones under Rs. 10,000 in India, focusing on comfort, sound quality, and reliability for long sessions. Options include the HyperX Cloud III and Razer Barracuda X for immersive audio and flexibility, the Audio-Technica ATH-M20x for balanced wired sound, and budget-friendly picks like the JBL Quantum 100M2 and HyperX Cloud Stinger 2 Core. Together, they cater to competitive gamers, casual players, and first-time headset buyers.
title: Best Gaming Headphones Under Rs 10,000 in India: HyperX Cloud III, Razer Barracuda X, and More

description: The Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026 is scheduled to begin on January 6. However, tech giants have already begun announcing and unveiling new devices, including smart TVs, laptops, and smart home appliances. Additionally, rumours regarding what will be showcased during the trade show also started surfacing online recently. The event will be held in Nevada's Las Vegas Convention Center (LVCC), and will run through January 9.
title: CES 2026 Roundup: Everything Announced Before the Trade Show Begins on January 6

description: Downton Abbey: The Grand Finale is set to release on OTT on January 12, 2026, wrapping up the beloved British period drama with a captivating storyline, strong performances, and positive reviews from both critics and audiences worldwide.
title: Downton Abbey: The Grand Finale Set for OTT Release This January 2026

description: Poco M8 5G will be offered in India in Carbon Black, Glacial Blue, and Frost Silver colourways, the Chinese smartphone maker updated the phone's dedicated microsite to confirm the same. The company has also revealed that the phone will pack a 5,520mAh silicon carbon battery with 45W wired fast charging and 18W reverse charging support. This comes days before the launch of the Poco M8 5G in India, which is scheduled to take place on January 8 at 12pm IST.
title: Poco M8 5G Colourways, Battery Details Revealed Ahead of January 8 Launch in India

description: Samsung Galaxy S26+ has been listed on the BIS website with the model number SM-S947B/DS, and the handset could launch in India soon. The “B” in the model number refers to the international variant. The “DS” suffix points to the dual-SIM support. Samsung could launch both the Galaxy S26+ and Galaxy S26 Edge in select markets.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26+ India Launch Appears Imminent as Smartphone Lands on BIS Database

description: Samsung, which had rolled out Gemini-backed AI features to about 400 million mobile products, including smartphones and tablets, by last year, plans to boost that figure to 800 million in 2026.
title: Samsung to Double Galaxy AI Mobile Devices to 800 Million Units This Year

description: Chikoo Ya Bunty: Raja Beta Kaun (Two Brothers One Crown) is an engaging animated film for kids that revolves around sibling rivalry, family emotions, and moral lessons. With relatable characters and entertaining storytelling, the series appeals strongly to young audiences and parents.
title: Chikoo Ya Bunty: Raja Beta Kaun Now Available for Streaming Online: What You Need to Know

description: CMF Headphone Pro and CMF Watch 3 Pro are confirmed to arrive in India soon. The company has yet to announce the exact launch date. The CMF Headphone Pro, which was introduced in select global markets in September 2025, has been teased in light green as well as black and orange variants. Meanwhile, the CMF Watch 3 Pro, which was unveiled in some regions in July 2025, has also been teased in similar colour options. T
title: CMF Headphone Pro, CMF Watch 3 Pro Confirmed to Launch in India Soon; Colourways Teased

description: Constable Kanakam Season 2 is an upcoming Telugu mystery thriller series that stars Varsha Bollamma in the lead role. Streaming soon.
title: Constable Kanakam Season 2 OTT Release Date Revealed: Know When and Where to Watch This Telugu Mystery Thriller Series

description: The MediaTek Dimensity 8500 chipset will be launched this month, the company announced on Monday. In recent weeks, the rumour mill has suggested that the chipmaker was testing the upcoming mobile processor for powering several upcoming phones, and it could offer performance and efficiency improvements over its predecessor, the Dimensity 8400.
title: MediaTek Dimensity 8500 Chip Launch Date Announced; May Feature Mali-G720 GPU

description: Directed by Rosshan Andrrews, Salute is a 2022 Malayalam crime thriller film that stars Dulquer Salmaan in the lead role. The film is now available to stream on Sony LIV, in multiple languages.
title: Salute Now Streaming on Sony LIV: Know Everything about Plot, Cast, and More

description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang’s address is set for Monday, January 5, ahead of the official CES exhibition kick-off. The session, titled “Nvidia Live at CES 2026 with Founder and CEO Jensen Huang,” begins at 1pm PT (2:30am IST on January 6) at the Fontainebleau Las Vegas venue, in the BleauLive Theatre.
title: CES 2026: When, Where to Watch Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang’s Keynote on What’s Next on AI

description: The 2025 Steam Awards winners were announced on Saturday after user voting closed. Hollow Knight: Silksong was named Game of the Year over the likes of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 and Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2. Extraction shooter Arc Raiders was voted as the winner of the Most Innovative Gameplay award.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Voted Game of the Year at 2025 Steam Awards: Full List of Winners

description: Apple has shipped iPhone models worth $50 billion (about Rs. 4.51 Lakh Crore) since FY22, when it was onboarded the production-linked incentive (PLI) scheme, Union IT Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw said. According to a report, the Cupertino-based tech giant managed to ship Indian made iPhone models about $16 billion (about Rs. 1.44 Lakh Crore) in the first nine months of the FY25. The minister also highlighted that electronics are now among the top three commodities exported out of the country.
title: iPhone Shipments From India Cross $50 Billion Under PLI Scheme, IT Minister Says

description: Oppo A6 Pro 5G has been launched in India, the company announced on Monday. The new smartphone can be purchased via the Oppo India online store in Aurora Gold and Cappuccino Brown colourways. It is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, paired with 8GB of LPDDR4x RAM and up to 256GB of UFS 2.2 onboard storage. It is equipped with a 7,000mAh battery. The phone supports 80W wired fast charging, too. It carries a dual rear camera setup, headlined by a 50-megapixeol primary shooter.
title: Oppo A6 Pro 5G Launched in India With 7,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Camera: Price, Specifications

description: Redmi Turbo 5 Max confirmed to launch in China later this month. The new handset will debut in the CNY 2,500 (roughly Rs. 33,000) price segment. The Redmi Turbo 5 series is expected to feature MediaTek Dimensity chipsets. The company may use the Dimensity 8500 for the Turbo 5 and the Dimensity 9500e for the Turbo 5 Pro.
title: Redmi Turbo 5 Max Confirmed to Launch This Month; Company Teases Price Range

description: Samsung may raise smartphone prices in India starting January 5, based on posts by a tipster. The reported revision could affect multiple Galaxy models across price segments and apply to all RAM and storage variants. Models such as the Galaxy A56, Galaxy A36, and Galaxy F17 5G may see hikes ranging from Rs. 1,000 to Rs. 2,000. The tipster also claims other Galaxy phones could be impacted. Samsung has not confirmed the reported price changes.
title: Samsung Galaxy A56, Galaxy A36, and Galaxy F17 5G Reportedly Get Price Hikes in India

description: Plaud, the San Francisco-based artificial intelligence (AI) startup, has launched NotePin S, the latest version of its wearable recording and notetaking device. The successor to the Plaud NotePin, which was launched in August 2024, comes with one major upgrade — a physical button. Unlike the predecessor, which operated based on haptic touches, the newer model offers a more reliable way of registering input.
title: Plaud NotePin S Launched With Physical Button, New AI Notetaking App for Desktop Introduced

description: The Realme Neo 8 has surfaced in multiple leaks originating from China in recent weeks, hinting towards its imminent debut. Its launch timeline has now been confirmed by the brand. The upcoming handset is expected to arrive as the successor to the Realme Neo 7, which arrived in China in December 2024. The company has also revealed a few key details about the phone. The Realme Neo 8 is confirmed to be available in a Cyber Purple colourway, powered by the recently announced Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset.
title: Realme Neo 8 With Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Chip to Launch in China This Month

description: Vivo X200T could launch soon. Ahead of any formal announcement, the handset has popped up on the Bluetooth SIG website with model number V2561. It has also appeared on the BIS certification website, indicating that the Vivo X200T will make its way to the Indian market soon. Additionally, the Vivo X300 FE was also spotted on the BIS website. The Vivo X200T is expected to come with a MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ chipset and a 6,500mAh battery
title: Vivo X200T Surfaces on Bluetooth SIG and BIS Websites, Suggesting India Launch Is on the Cards

description: Vivo is expected to hold a launch event in China in March, where it may unveil the Vivo X300 Ultra and the Vivo X300s. Leaks suggest the Vivo X300s will arrive as a minor upgrade over the Vivo X300, powered by the Dimensity 9500+ chipset. It is tipped to feature a 6.78-inch 1.5K OLED display, a 200-megapixel primary camera alongside a periscope telephoto shooter, and a 7,000mAh battery. The phone may remain China-exclusive initially.
title: Vivo X300s Key Specifications Including Dimensity 9500+ SoC Leak Ahead of Anticipated Launch in China

description: Asus ROG Phone and Asus Zenfone lineups will not get new models in 2026, as the Taiwan-based tech firm reportedly pauses launch plans for the same. Additionally, Taiwanese smartphone retailers have stopped buying Asus' handsets, a report claims. To assure its existing customers, the company is said to continue providing warranty coverage and maintenance services. Moreover, the existing ROG and Zenfone models will reportedly continue to receive software updates.
title: Asus Reportedly Pauses Plans to Launch ROG Phone, Zenfone Models in 2026

description: Ahead of the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026, LG has unveiled its smart TV lineup for the ongoing year. The South Korean consumer tech company has revived its Wallpaper-branded smart TVs, known for ultra-thin frames. Apart from this, LG has also introduced Gallery TV, a new art-focused display that takes on Samsung’s The Frame.
title: CES 2026: LG Brings Back Ultra-Thin Wallpaper OLED, Unveils Gallery TV to Take On Samsung’s Frame

description: The iQOO 15 Ultra will be launched in China soon, the company confirmed via social media on Monday. The handset was recently rumoured to arrive as a new model that sits above the iQOO 15 in the flagship lineup. iQOO has teased that its upcoming phone will be an “ultra-performance” device. While its features and specifications are yet to be unveiled by the Vivo sub-brand, it has been tipped to offer several gaming-centric features.
title: iQOO 15 Ultra Launch Timeline Announced; Set to Arrive Before Spring Festival in China

description: OnePlus Nord 6 with the model number CPH2795 has reportedly appeared on the TUV database. The listing hints at support for 80W wired fast charging. It is expected to launch soon as a rebrand of the OnePlus Ace 6, which was unveiled in China last year. It is likely to feature a 6.83-inch display and a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
title: OnePlus Nord 6 Charging Details Revealed via TUV Certification, Tipped to Launch in Q1 2026

description: Oppo A6s is set to launch soon globally, according to the company website. The phone will be offered in Cappuccino Brown and Ice White colourways via the Oppo online store. It will be powered by a Snapdragon 685 chipset, paired with 8GB of LPDDR4x RAM and up to 256GB of UFS 2.2 onboard storage. It will be backed by a 7,000mAh battery with support for 80W SuperVOOC wired fast charging. The Oppo A6s will also carry a dual rear camera setup, headlined by a 50-megapixel primary shooter.
title: Oppo A6s With 7,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Camera Listed on Company's Website, Could Launch Soon

description: Oppo Find X9 Ultra camera specifications have leaked, hinting at a aggressive quad-camera setup. It is tipped to feature dual 200-megapixel sensors, including a Sony LYTIA 901 primary camera and a 200-megapixel OmniVision periscope telephoto lens. The phone may also include a 50-megapixel ultra-wide and 10x telephoto camera. Other expected features include a 2K 120Hz AMOLED display, a 7,000mAh battery, fast charging, and a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset.
title: Oppo Find X9 Ultra Tipped to Feature Dual 200-Megapixel Cameras in New Leak

description: Sony has announced the lineup of PS Plus monthly games for January 2026. This month's PS Plus lineup includes . Arcade racer Need for Speed Unbound, platformer Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed, and survival title Core Keeper. All three games will be available from January 6.
title: PS Plus Monthly Games for January Include NFS Unbound, Epic Mickey: Rebrushed and Core Keeper

description: Samsung has unveiled the world’s first 130-inch Micro RGB TV at CES 2026. The R95H is Samsung’s largest Micro RGB display yet and features a redesigned Timeless Frame with integrated speakers. It uses AI-based picture processing, supports 100 percent BT.2020 colour coverage, glare-free coating, and HDR10+ Advanced. The TV is powered by the Micro RGB AI Engine Pro and includes Vision AI Companion features. Pricing and availability have not been announced.
title: CES 2026: Samsung Launches 130-Inch Micro RGB TV With New Frame Design, Eclipsa Audio

description: Microsoft Chairman and CEO Satya Nadella has outlined his vision for the artificial Intelligence (AI) landscape in 2026, highlighting a transition beyond standalone models and toward AI systems designed for real-world use and impact. In a year-end post titled “Looking Ahead to 2026,” Nadella wrote that the industry is moving past early discovery phases and into “widespread diffusion” of AI technologies.
title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella Says AI Must Evolve From Models to Systems for Real-World Impact

description: Motorola launched the Razr 60 Ultra in India in May 2025. Now, the smartphone maker appears to be preparing to launch another Razr handset in a different form factor. Dubbed the Motorola Razr Fold, a tipster claims that the phone could be unveiled by the tech firm later this year as its first book-style foldable. It could also ship with various AI tools, as per the leaked marketing banner. Recently, various journalists received an invitation to the CES 2026, which teased the launch of a horizontally folding Motorola smartphone.
title: Motorola Razr Fold Tipped to Launch This Year as Company’s First Book-Style Foldable

description: At CES 2026, Samsung Electronics showcased its vision of “Your Companion to AI Living,” emphasising AI as a foundational philosophy that shapes its products, operations, and user experiences across its entire ecosystem. The 130-inch Micro RGB TV was the key highlight of the event. Samsung is also expanding its capabilities in dementia detection. It has also launched new  AI-powered home appliances during the event.
title: Samsung Unveils AI-Powered Home Ecosystem With Bespoke Home Appliances at CES 2026

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra is expected to be launched later this month or in early February. With little time remaining, new information about the device is surfacing more quickly. The smartphone will be part of the Galaxy S26 series, with the base model and the Galaxy S26+ joining the Ultra variant. A new leak has now revealed the possible colour options for the Galaxy S26 Ultra, suggesting that the nomenclature might see a branding shift away from “Titanium.”
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Leaked Colour Options Suggest a Move Away From Titanium
